Verify the Physical Disability
Verify the Cognitive Disability
Verify the Literacy Disability        Reading problems,find words difficult
Verify the Hearing Disability
Evaluating the Accessibility of a Website for Content"
Evaluating the Accessibility of a Website for code
Evaluating the Accessibility of a Website for Mark-up languages
Evaluating the Accessibility of a Website for Development tools
Evaluating the Accessibility of a Website for Environment
Verification of page title
Verification of Image text alternatives (“alt text”)
Verification of Headings
Verification of Contrast ratio (“color contrast”).. etc.
Verify the Co-ordination
Verify the size of the images
Verify the headings whether it is properly aligned or not
Verify the color of the hyperlink(s)
Verify the Enforcement
Verify the ease of following all the possible workflows of the application
Verify if the application and it's support documents (like user-guide) are aligned properly
Verify the Leadership
Verify the Consideration of access
Verify the Technical dimensions.
Verify that Visually disabled user is able to access web page by clicking on the tab button from the keyboard and move from link to link
Verify that large sentence are divided into a small simple sentence to easily remember by visually disabled user
Verify that heading is unique and conveying the meaning & structure or not
Verify that meaningful multimedia caption is provided or not
Verify that user knows about the approximate page load time
Verify that captions, labels, and headings are available and they are descriptive.
Verify that text within an image can be read by zooming in
Verify that the focus is clear when user tab through the elements
Veriy that pop-ups are avoided as it creates problems for the users taking help from screen readers
Verify that there are product alerts given as per requirement
Verify that the text justifies the content by disabling image files. Sometime loading the images takes a lot of time and also some users may not have access to the images
